organizations: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
lead_paragraph: One week after No. 11 Virginia Tech squandered a 10-point lead to Boston College in the final minutes, Sean Glennon threw two long touchdown passes and ran for another score to lead the host Hokies to a 27-3 victory against Georgia Tech (5-4, 2-4 Atlantic Coast Conference) last night.No. 11 Virginia Tech (7-2, 4-1) moved into a first-place tie with its rival Virginia in the Coastal Division.
